summary: Two sisters befriend a mysterious foreigner who washes up on the beach of their 1930s Cornish seaside village.
cast: Judi Dench|Maggie Smith|Daniel Brühl|Freddie Jones|Gregor Henderson-Begg|Miriam Margolyes|David Warner|Clive Russell|Richard Pears|Natascha McElhone|Iain Marshall|Toby Jones|Trevor Ray|John Boswall|Joanna Dickens|Geoffrey Bayldon|Timothy Bateson|Rebecca Hulbert|Finty Williams|Roger Booth|Jimmy Yuill|Peter Cellier|Alan Cox|Arthur Askey|Joshua Bell|Tom Frankland|Frederick Grisewood|Laurence Pears|Oliver Wakefield
title: La última primavera
